definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: Hadadezer (so Aram. Inscr. [[הדדעזר]] Eut:SBAK 1885, 679 cf. Bae:Rel 67; LXX throughout (erroneously) ï Adra(a)zar;—Hadad is help(er), cf. COT 1K 1Ki 20:1 & Ph. [[אשמנעזר]]); king of [[חוֹבָה]] (q.v.), son of [[רְחׂב]], defeated by David 2Sa 8:3, 2Sa 8:5, 2Sa 8:10, 2Sa 8:12; [[הֲדַדְעָָזֶר]] v:2Sa 8:7, v:2Sa 8:8, v:2Sa 8:9, v:2Sa 8:10 (= [[הֲדַרְעֶזֶר]] q.v. 2Sa 10:16, 2Sa 10:16, 2Sa 10:19, 1Ch 18:3, 1Ch 18:5, 1Ch 18:7, 1Ch 18:8, 1Ch 18:10, 1Ch 18:10, 1Ch 19:16, 1Ch 19:19, all erron., v. inscr. supr., & cf. Bae:l.c. Dr on 2Sa 8:3, 2Sa 10:16); also 1Ki 11:23.
